SocketClient::SocketClient ( Server *  server,
const sint_t &  descriptor 
)

Definition at line 480 of file socketclient.cpp.

References Server::gSocketOpen(), m_command_queue, m_idle, m_input, m_output, m_server, m_state, socket_client_list, sServer(), and Server::sSocketOpen().

                                                                     : Socket( server, descriptor )
{
    m_command_queue.clear();
    m_idle = 0;
    m_input.clear();
    m_output.clear();
    sServer( server );
    m_state = SOC_STATE_DISCONNECTED;

    m_server->sSocketOpen( m_server->gSocketOpen() + 1 );
    socket_client_list.push_back( this );

    return;
}

const bool SocketClient::New (  )  [virtual]

Implements Socket.

Definition at line 42 of file socketclient.cpp.

References CFG_STR_LOGIN, CSTR, Delete(), Socket::gDescriptor(), Socket::gHostname(), Socket::gPort(), LOGERRNO, LOGFMT, LOGSTR, Thread::MutexLock(), Send(), Socket::sHostname(), SOC_STATE_LOGIN_SCREEN, Socket::sPort(), sState(), and UFLAGS_DE.

Referenced by Thread().

{
    UFLAGS_DE( flags );
    sint_t error = 0;
    sockaddr_storage sin;
    socklen_t size = static_cast<socklen_t>( sizeof( sin ) );
    char hostname[CFG_STR_MAX_BUFLEN], service[CFG_STR_MAX_BUFLEN];

    MutexLock();

    if ( ::fcntl( gDescriptor(), F_SETFL, O_NONBLOCK ) < 0 )
    {
        LOGERRNO( flags, "SocketClient::New()->fcntl()->" );
        return false;
    }

    if ( ::getpeername( gDescriptor(), reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>( &sin ), &size ) < 0 )
    {
        LOGERRNO( flags, "SocketClient::New()->getpeername()->" );

        if ( !sHostname( "(unknown)" ) )
        {
            LOGSTR( flags, "SocketClient::New()->SocketClient::sHostname()-> hostname (unknown) returned false" );
            Delete();
            return false;
        }
    }
    else
    {
        if ( ( error = ::getnameinfo( reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>( &sin ), size, hostname, sizeof( hostname ), service, sizeof( service ), NI_NUMERICSERV) ) != 0 )
        {
            LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::New()->getnameinfo()-> returned errno %d:%s", error, gai_strerror( error ) );
            Delete();
            return false;
        }

        if ( !sHostname( hostname ) )
        {
            LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::New()->SocketClient::sHostname()-> hostname %s returned false", hostname );
            Delete();
            return false;
        }

        if ( !sPort( atol( service ) ) )
        {
            LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::New()->SocketClient::sPort()-> port %lu returned false", atol( service ) );
            Delete();
            return false;
        }

        LOGFMT( 0, "SocketClient::New()-> %s:%lu (%lu)", CSTR( gHostname() ), gPort(), gDescriptor() );
    }

    // negotiate telopts, send login message
    if ( !Send( CFG_STR_LOGIN ) )
    {
        LOGSTR( flags, "SocketClient::New()->SocketClient::Send()-> msg CFG_STR_LOGIN returned false" );
        Delete();
        return false;
    }

    if ( !sState( SOC_STATE_LOGIN_SCREEN ) )
    {
        LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::New()->SocketClient::sState()-> state %lu returned false", SOC_STATE_LOGIN_SCREEN );
        Delete();
        return false;
    }

    MutexLock();

    return true;
}

const bool SocketClient::ProcessCommand (  ) 

Definition at line 115 of file socketclient.cpp.

References CRLF, Socket::gDescriptor(), gServer(), ITER, LOGFMT, m_command_queue, Send(), Server::Shutdown(), UFLAGS_DE, and Socket::Valid().

Referenced by Server::ProcessInput().

{
    UFLAGS_DE( flags );
    ITER( vector, string, vi );
    ITER( vector, string, vi_next );
    string cmd;

    if ( !Valid() )
    {
        LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::ProcessCommand()->SocketClient::Valid()-> descriptor %ld returned false", gDescriptor() );
        return false;
    }

    // Nothing new to process; move along
    if ( m_command_queue.empty() )
        return true;

    for ( vi = m_command_queue.begin(); vi != m_command_queue.end(); vi = vi_next )
    {
        cmd = *vi;
        vi_next = m_command_queue.erase( vi );

        if ( cmd.compare( "shutdown" ) == 0 )
            gServer()->Shutdown( EXIT_SUCCESS );
        else
        {
            Send( cmd );
            Send( CRLF );
        }
    }

    return true;
}

const bool SocketClient::ProcessInput (  ) 

Definition at line 149 of file socketclient.cpp.

References CSTR, Socket::gDescriptor(), ITER, LOGFMT, m_input, QueueCommand(), Utils::StrNewlines(), UFLAGS_DE, and Socket::Valid().

Referenced by Update().

{
    UFLAGS_DE( flags );
    vector<string> commands;
    string command;
    ITER( vector, string, vi );

    if ( !Valid() )
    {
        LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::ProcessInput()->SocketClient::Valid()-> descriptor %ld returned false", gDescriptor() );
        return false;
    }

    // Nothing new to process; move along
    if ( m_input.empty() )
        return true;

    commands = Utils::StrNewlines( m_input );
    for ( vi = commands.begin(); vi != commands.end(); vi++ )
    {
        command = *vi;
        if ( !QueueCommand( command ) )
        {
            LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::ProcessInput()->SocketClient::QueueCommand()-> command %s returned false", CSTR( command ) );
            return false;
        }
    }

    m_input.clear();

    return true;
}

const bool SocketClient::Recv (  ) 

Definition at line 197 of file socketclient.cpp.

References CFG_STR_MAX_BUFLEN, CSTR, Socket::gBytesRecvd(), Socket::gDescriptor(), Socket::gHostname(), Server::gSocket(), LOGERRNO, LOGFMT, LOGSTR, m_input, m_server, Socket::sBytesRecvd(), sIdle(), UFLAGS_DE, and Socket::Valid().

Referenced by Update().

{
    UFLAGS_DE( flags );
    ssize_t amount = 0;
    char buf[CFG_STR_MAX_BUFLEN] = {'\0'};

    if ( !Valid() )
    {
        LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Recv()->SocketClient::Valid()-> descriptor %ld returned false", gDescriptor() );
        return false;
    }

    if ( ( m_input.length() + CFG_STR_MAX_BUFLEN ) >= m_input.max_size() )
    {
        LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Recv()-> called with m_input overflow: %lu + %lu", m_input.length(), CFG_STR_MAX_BUFLEN );
        return false;
    }

    if ( ( amount = ::recv( gDescriptor(), buf, CFG_STR_MAX_BUFLEN - 1, 0 ) ) < 1 )
    {
        if ( amount == 0 )
        {
            LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Recv()->recv()-> broken pipe encountered on recv from: %s", CSTR( gHostname() ) );
            return false;
        }
        else if ( errno != EAGAIN && errno != EWOULDBLOCK )
        {
            LOGERRNO( flags, "SocketClient::Recv()->recv()->" );
            return false;
        }
        else
            return true;
    }

    if ( !m_server->gSocket()->sBytesRecvd( m_server->gSocket()->gBytesRecvd() + amount ) )
    {
        LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Recv()->Server::gSocket()->Server::sBytesRecvd()-> value %lu returned false", m_server->gSocket()->gBytesRecvd() + amount );
        return false;
    }

    if ( !sBytesRecvd( gBytesRecvd() + amount ) )
    {
        LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Recv()->SocketClient::sBytesRecvd()-> value %lu returned false", gBytesRecvd() + amount );
        return false;
    }

    if ( !sIdle( 0 ) )
    {
        LOGSTR( flags, "SocketClient::Recv()->SocketClient::sIdle()-> value 0 returned false" );
        return false;
    }

    m_input += buf;

    return true;
}

const bool SocketClient::Send ( const string &  msg  ) 

Definition at line 254 of file socketclient.cpp.

References Socket::gDescriptor(), LOGFMT, m_output, m_state, UFLAGS_DE, and Socket::Valid().

Referenced by Update().

{
    UFLAGS_DE( flags );

    if ( !Valid() )
    {
        LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Send()->SocketClient::Valid()-> descriptor %ld returned false", gDescriptor() );
        return false;
    }

    // Prepend a CRLF to ensure output lands on a newline.
    // Make this client configurable in the future.
    if ( m_output.empty() && m_state > SOC_STATE_LOGIN_SCREEN )
    {
        m_output += CRLF;
        m_output += msg;
    }
    else
        m_output += msg;

    return true;
}

const bool SocketClient::Send (  ) 

Definition at line 277 of file socketclient.cpp.

References CSTR, Socket::gBytesSent(), Socket::gDescriptor(), Socket::gHostname(), Server::gSocket(), LOGERRNO, LOGFMT, m_output, m_server, Socket::sBytesSent(), UFLAGS_DE, and Socket::Valid().

Referenced by New(), and ProcessCommand().

{
    UFLAGS_DE( flags );
    ssize_t amount = 0;

    if ( !Valid() )
    {
        LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Send()->SocketClient::Valid()-> descriptor %ld returned false", gDescriptor() );
        return false;
    }

    // Nothing new to process; move along
    if ( m_output.empty() )
        return true;

    if ( ( amount = ::send( gDescriptor(), CSTR( m_output ), m_output.length(), 0 ) ) < 1 )
    {
        if ( amount == 0 )
        {
            LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Send()->send()-> broken pipe encountered on send to: %s", CSTR( gHostname() ) );
            return false;
        }
        else if ( errno != EAGAIN && errno != EWOULDBLOCK )
        {
            LOGERRNO( flags, "SocketClient::Send()->send()->" );
            return false;
        }
    }

    if ( !m_server->gSocket()->sBytesSent( m_server->gSocket()->gBytesSent() + amount ) )
    {
        LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Send()->Server::gSocket()->Server::sBytesSent()-> value %lu returned false", m_server->gSocket()->gBytesSent() + amount );
        return false;
    }

    if ( !sBytesSent( gBytesSent() + amount ) )
    {
        LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Send()->SocketClient::sBytesSent()-> value %lu returned false", gBytesSent() + amount );
        return false;
    }

    m_output.clear();

    return true;
}

Definition at line 323 of file socketclient.cpp.

References LOGERRNO, LOGSTR, New(), thread_list, UFLAGS_DE, Update(), and Socket::Valid().

Referenced by SocketServer::Accept().

{
    UFLAGS_DE( flags );
    pthread_t thread_id = 0;
    pthread_attr_t res_attr;

    if ( !Valid() )
    {
        LOGSTR( flags, "SocketClient::Thread()-> called with invalid socket" );
        return false;
    }

    if ( !New() )
    {
        LOGSTR( flags, "SocketClient::Thread()->SocketClient::Newd()-> returned false" );
        return false;
    }

    if ( ::pthread_attr_init( &res_attr ) != 0 )
    {
        LOGERRNO( flags, "SocketClient::Thread()->pthread_attr_init()->" );
        return false;
    }

    if ( ::pthread_attr_setdetachstate( &res_attr, PTHREAD_CREATE_JOINABLE ) != 0 )
    {
        LOGERRNO( flags, "SocketClient::Thread()->pthread_attr_setdetachstate()->" );
        return false;
    }

    if ( ::pthread_create( &thread_id, &res_attr, &SocketClient::Update, this ) != 0 )
    {
        LOGERRNO( flags, "SocketClient::Thread()->pthread_create()->" );
        return false;
    }

    if ( ::pthread_attr_destroy( &res_attr ) != 0 )
    {
        LOGERRNO( flags, "SocketClient::Thread()->pthread_attr_destroy()->" );
        return false;
    }

    thread_list.insert( pair<pthread_t,string>( thread_id, "SocketClient::Thread()" ) );

    return true;
}

void * SocketClient::Update ( void *  data  )  [static]

Definition at line 370 of file socketclient.cpp.

References CFG_STR_IDLE, Delete(), Socket::gDescriptor(), gIdle(), gServer(), LOGFMT, LOGSTR, ProcessInput(), Recv(), Server::Running(), Send(), sIdle(), UFLAGS_DE, USLEEP_MAX, and Socket::Valid().

Referenced by Thread().

{
    UFLAGS_DE( flags );
    SocketClient* socket_client = reinterpret_cast<SocketClient*>( data );

    if ( !socket_client->Valid() )
    {
        LOGSTR( flags, "SocketClient::Update()-> called with invalid socket" );
        socket_client->Delete();
    }

    for ( ;; )
    {
        if ( !socket_client->sIdle( socket_client->gIdle() + 1 ) )
        {
            LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Update()->SocketClient::sIdle()-> descriptor %ld returned false setting idle: %lu", socket_client->gDescriptor(), socket_client->gIdle() + 1 );
            socket_client->Delete();
        }

        // Disconnect sockets that have been idle for too long
        if ( socket_client->gIdle() >= CFG_SOC_MAX_IDLE )
        {
            LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Update()->SocketClient::gIdle()-> disconnecting idle descriptor: %ld", socket_client->gDescriptor() );
            socket_client->Send( CFG_STR_IDLE );
            socket_client->Delete();
        }

        // Read input, save game character and disconnect socket if unable to
        if ( !socket_client->Recv() )
        {
            LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Update()->SocketClient::Recv()-> descriptor %ld returned false", socket_client->gDescriptor() );
            socket_client->Delete();
        }

        if ( !socket_client->ProcessInput() )
        {
            LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Update()->SocketClient::ProcessInput()-> descriptor %ld returned false", socket_client->gDescriptor() );
            socket_client->Delete();
        }

        if ( !socket_client->Send() )
        {
            LOGFMT( flags, "SocketClient::Update()->SocketClient::Send()-> descriptor %ld returned false", socket_client->gDescriptor() );
            socket_client->Delete();
        }

        if ( !socket_client->gServer()->Running() )
            break;

        ::usleep( USLEEP_MAX / CFG_GAM_PULSE_RATE );
    }

    socket_client->Delete();
    ::pthread_exit( reinterpret_cast<void*>( EXIT_SUCCESS ) );
}
